Summary: Saw 2 very bright lights above trees, no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son was on a walk lastnight. There was a fullmoon clear skys, lots of stars. We live out in the country away from city lights. Saw 2 very bright lights above the trees moving very slow. He tried to get a picture with his cell phone, but it didn't show up. It made no sound. He could see the lights were not attached to anything. They were not connected to each other. Not airplane landing lights. No blinking lights. Over the summer we have seen alot of round orange lights moving slowly from the west to the north. No binking lights.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Laurie
There were no other sightings in Laurie on or around September 15th 2008
